question: Israeli Modern Art Exhibition was inaugurated in __________.
explanation: A first of its kind Israeli Modern Art Exhibition was inaugurated in New Delhi. This exhibition titled 'To the End of Land' was organised by National Gallery of Modern Art, New Delhi in collaboration with the Embassy of Israel in India and the Petach Tikva Museum of Art, Israel. It was organised to mark the occasion of 25 years of diplomatic relations between India and Israel. The exhibition is a collection of contemporary art creations of 19 Israeli artists, including the internationally acclaimed Shahar Marcus who also performed at the exhibition opening. The innovative modern art pieces and installations at the exhibition focus on connection of human beings with land, territory, locality and identity.
